name: Utility Token Boxch
description: Boxch Wallet is non custodial safe wallet. Users can send and receive liquid tokens and pay gas fees in those tokens. Boxch is able to connect to decentralized applications through the WalletConnect protocol. And you can also store your secret keys in the super-secure, crypto-secure key vault Boxch Safe. Boxch also makes an invaluable contribution to the crypto-industry by educating users about the benefits of storing cryptocurrency in non-custodial wallets through the Boxch Academy. A simple but reliable wallet for every day
